summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AetherX cinematic landing page. Backend API working perfectly with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI fully functional with beautiful animations, smooth scroll, and video modal. Newsletter integration working correctly. Minor issue found with duplicate email error message timing in frontend.

ui_bugs.issue: Duplicate email error message appears briefly but may not persist long enough for user to read
ui_bugs.description: Error message shows correctly but might have timing issue with auto-clear after 5 seconds

passed_tests: Hero section loads with AETHERX title and tagline
Watch Trailer button opens YouTube video modal
Navigation bar with all links functional
Smooth scroll to all sections working
Story section with parallax and stats (3+ Years R&D, 50M+ Parameters)
Gallery section with bento grid layout
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider extending the error message display duration in Newsletter.jsx from 5 seconds to 8-10 seconds to ensure users can read duplicate email errors properly.
